item.description:
Not So Silent Cinema

Orchestrated Film!!!

Tickets are 23.50 through paypal, your RSVP of yes will take you into Paypal.  I have reserved a table cabaret style right side front of the theater, and will add on more tables depending on interest. Lets get there early - 7:00 and we can order a Two Boots Pizza, (the Ticket is for the Film and orchestra reservation, processing fee included).

Stumbling through shooting galleries, trains, secret societies, and falling houses Buster Keaton delivers outrageous stunts and antics (all with the famous deadpan delivery that earned him the nickname “The Great Stone Face”) in four classic comedic shorts. Enjoy these films along with Brendan Cooney’s fresh new original scores, complementing the films with a classic 1920’s urban-Americana soundscape, combining many strands of American roots music. Ragtime and old-time meet the blues, bluegrass and hot jazz, played live by Cooney’s award-winning Not So Silent Cinema trio.

More Info

http://www.cooneymusic.com/

Doors Open at 7:00pm
Show Starts at 8:00pm
Cabaret Seating: $23.50

Parking
Parking garage available directly across the street.
Street parking available on Fairfield Avenue and Broad Street.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at 7:00, there will be a table reserved for Arts & Creative Cultural Events
item.name: Not So Silent Cinema
